description:
An extension which adds a Windows-like snap assist to GNOME. It changes GNOME's 2 column tiling design to a 2x2 grid. There are also ways to use more complex layouts...

You should remove GNOME's tiling keybindings and set them in the settings of this extension.

Additional features:

 - spiral tiling (hold Shift or Alt when tiling an app with the dash)
 - custom layouts
 - raise tiled windows as a group
 - and more...

Check out the README on Github for all features, on how to use them and report issues there as well.
name: Tiling assistant
